Annual Report Card - {{ doc.student_name }}

Student ID: {{ doc.student }}

{% set exams = frappe.get_all("Exam", fields=["name", "exam_name", "subject", "total_marks"], order_by="subject, exam_name") %} {% set exam_data = {} %} {% for exam in exams %} {% set results = frappe.get_all("Student Exam Result", filters={"parent": exam.name, "student": doc.student}, fields=["marks_obtained", "status"] ) %} {% if results %} {% set result = results[0] %} {% set subject = exam.subject %} {% if subject not in exam_data %} {% set _ = exam_data.update({subject: []}) %} {% endif %} {% set _ = exam_data[subject].append({ "exam_name": exam.exam_name, "marks": result.marks_obtained if result.status != "Absent" else "-", "total": exam.total_marks, "status": result.status }) %} {% endif %} {% endfor %} {% for subject, exams in exam_data.items() %}

{{ subject }}

{% set total = 0 %} {% set out_of = 0 %} {% for e in exams %} {% if e.status != "Absent" %} {% set total = total + (e.marks or 0) %} {% set out_of = out_of + e.total %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
Exam Marks Obtained Total Marks Status
{{ e.exam_name }} {{ e.marks }} {{ e.total }} {{ e.status }}
Total {{ total }} {{ out_of }}

name: Annual Report Card
